ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The little things in life... (patch stuff)
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard the new cap is 252.  Will need to get a lvl 60 person to verify. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
I heard the new cap is 252. Will need to get a lvl 60 person to verify.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 16, 2000 9:38 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] The little things in life... (patch stuff)
>
>
> I got a "you have gotten better at singing (201)" message last night.
>
> Sylly
>
> and i been singing lots and lots to get mid-way 54 so my guess is they
> raised the caps
>
> -----Original Message-----

> Although I dont have a link available, I stumbled across an Absor post

>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox

> Guild Leader, Defenders of Aleria
